page.title: 05Slyne-with-Hest Youth Groups
page.content: In Slyne-with-Hest there are five youth groups-scouts,cubs,guides,brownies and a youth club.The scouts sometimes go to Lancaster University for swimming and to Space Skate in Morecambe roller skating.The scout camps include hikes and canoeing. Slyne-with-Hest scouts go to camp about four times a year.This year Slyne-with-Hest youth club held a sponsored sports night.In the summer there is a brownie sports day and there is an "Its a knock out competition" Guides often play rounders outside. They go to the shore at Hest Bank and cook sausages and chocolate in bananas. There are about 2 guide camps a year. The brownies sometimes hold discos in the hut belonging to the Slyne-with- Hest youth groups.
